modName: Imperial Guards At Castle Dour In Solitude Wear Heavy Armor
summary: The two guards in Solitude who guard Castle Dour wear armor more fitting for there job.
descriptionHtml:
Simple npc edit so that the guards outside the door wear heavy armor. Figured that they are guarding General Tulius so they should look like veterans.

Compatible with re-textures and Imperial Legion overhauls.

If you've been there already you will have to resurrect them using the console.



Please also check some of my other mods

Sleeved Guards http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37324/?

Sleeved Imperials http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50281/?

Darker Imperial Armor http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41911/?
author: Fourkillmaster
